description.value:
The Lord of the Dread Host rules the armies of Pit at Balor's hand. Gumoth emphasizes rage and martial strength, commanding his followers to test themselves in battle.

Edicts: Seek glory in battle, test yourself, destroy all obstacles in your path.

Anathema: Cower from fights, prevent conflict through negotiation, go a week without a fight.

Areas of Concern: Battle, strength, weapons.
